review: Love love love this bought 2 more for my family members to try very easy to install and operate definitely recommend the fire stick
author: Jenni

review: Awesome!!! Easy install..easy operation..best in class.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Simple - Works fine, even when traveling
author: Function Reviewer

review: The TV stick plugged right into the back of my TV and works great.  I'm glad my son was there to set it up.  He told me which buttons to push.
author: S Kowski

review: Smooth operation. Seems faster then others.
author: J. Skroch

review: The Firestick streams through my wifi with little interruption. I've been able to link to all the channels I've hoped to find and it's High Def. Highly recommend it.
author: Rob Fulton

review: I really enjoy this but can't get facebook and sometime the connection is slow. Overall I would have given it a 4.5 but couldn't.
author: Carrie L. Ferguson

review: Love this product. All in one. Now I don't need dish or cable. No more monthly bill
author: Jennifer DeCock
